dummyData.title: Wednesday
dummyData.description: Smart, sarcastic and a little dead inside, Merlina Addams investigates a murder spree while making new friends (and enemies) at the Nevermore Academy.

dummyData.title: Heartstopper
dummyData.description: Charlie and Nick are ready to take things to the next level. As they get closer in every way, they face their relationship’s biggest challenge yet.

dummyData.title: Sister's Feud
dummyData.description: A woman's refusal to join her sister's twisted scheme sparks betrayal and revenge as she tries to reunite with her long-lost daughter in prison.

dummyData.title: Arcane
dummyData.description: Alliances are forged, allegiances are smashed and fresh dangers emerge as the battle between Piltover and Zaun inspires both glory and heartbreak.

dummyData.title: The Piano Lesson
dummyData.description: A family clash over an heirloom piano unleashes haunting truths about how the past is perceived and who defines a family legacy.

dummyData.title: Élite
dummyData.description: A new school year in Las Encinas and the students want nothing more than for things to go back to normal. However, an unexpected event will force them to make choices that will change their lives forever.

dummyData.title: Woman of the Hour
dummyData.description: An aspiring actress crosses paths with a prolific serial killer in '70s LA when they're cast on an episode of "The Dating Game." Based on a true story.

dummyData.title: Blue Box
dummyData.description: A coming-of-age love story revolving around school sports clubs, this series delicately portrays relatable characters who devote themselves wholeheartedly to their club activities, as well as the subtle emotions that arise when they fall for someone.

dummyData.title: Bridgerton
dummyData.description: "Dear reader, this author must inquire... what is the primary force that guides us on our paths? Is it our minds, or our hearts? Perhaps we should discover the answer together..."

dummyData.title: Heartstopper
dummyData.description: In between, a trip to Paris, exams and the preparation for the end-of-year dance will be the scenarios in which the new life experiences of the characters will be framed.

dummyData.title: The Strays
dummyData.description: A perfect life... a perfect lie... An upper-middle-class woman's perfectly crafted life begins to unravel with the arrival of two shadowy figures in her town.

dummyData.title: Ranma 1/2
dummyData.description: Ranma Saotome and Akane Tendo's parents have arranged for them to get married. However, there's a problem: whenever Ranma is splashed with cold water, he turns into a girl!

dummyData.title: Family Switch
dummyData.description: A family descends into chaos days before Christmas when a rare cosmic event causes the parents to swap bodies with their teenage kids.

dummyData.title: Unstable
dummyData.description: A biotech genius tries to bounce back from the depths of grief with help from his son, who works to escape his dad's shadow and save the family business.

dummyData.title: Nimona
dummyData.description: A knight framed for a tragic crime teams with a scrappy, shape-shifting teen to prove his innocence. But what if she's the monster he's sworn to destroy?

dummyData.title: Bridgerton
dummyData.description: "All is fair in love and war."

dummyData.title: Heartstopper
dummyData.description: Love meets doubt. Fear meets joy. Boy meets boy. "Heartstopper," an eight chapter story about life, love and everything in between.

dummyData.title: Ratched
dummyData.description: You deserve someone to show you mercy. From the creator of American Horror Story, witness the origin of one of the world's most iconic characters, Nurse Ratched.
